p: Streptozotocin-induced diabetic mice are one of the most commonly used animal models of diabetes mellitus. 33 It is well known for its selective pancreatic islet Î²-cell cytotoxicity and has been extensively used to induce DM in experimental mice model. Glibenclamide is often used as a standard antidiabetic drug in streptozotocin-induced diabetes to compare the activity of variety of medicinal plants with antidiabetic activities. 34
